asianFlash

Class AsianFlashDOM

  • java.lang.Object
    • asianFlash.AsianFlashDOM

  • public class AsianFlashDOM
extends Object
    This class contains operations required to read the AsianFlash DOM (Document-Object-Model) information from an XML file.
    Version:
    4.1
    Author:
    David E. Reese

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      Document to be parsed.
      private Element theElementList
      List of elements.

      Factory to create DocumentBuilder.
      private DocumentBuilder theParser
      Parser DocumentBuilder.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsianFlashDOM

        public AsianFlashDOM(String theFileName)
              throws Exception
        Constructor. The file name given as a parameter is the name of the file to be parsed.
        Parameters:
        theFileName - name of file to be parsed.
        Throws:
        Exception - Exception from attempt to create a new DocumentBuilder.

    • Method Detail

      • parseFile

        private void parseFile(String theFileName)
                throws Exception
        This method parses a given file.
        Parameters:
        theFileName - Name of the file.
        Throws:
        Exception - Exception generated on errors from called methods.

      • getSideFontName

        private String getSideFontName(String theSideName)
        This operation attempts to return the font name for a given side from the XML information.
        Parameters:
        theSideName - name of side element (Side1Information, Side2Information, or Side3Information).
        Returns:
        String containing the font name or null if it can not be found in the XML information.

      • getFontSizeString

        private String getFontSizeString(String theSideName)
        This operation returns the font size for a card side, based on information found in the XML SideInformation element in the file.
        Parameters:
        theSideName - Name of the side (Side1Information, Side2Information, or Side3Information).
        Returns:
        String containing the font size (which can be converted to an integer), or null if there was none in the file.

      • getTitleString

        private String getTitleString(String theSideName)
        This operation returns the title for a card side, based on information found in the XML SideInformation element in the file.
        Parameters:
        theSideName - Name of the side (Side1Information, Side2Information, or Side3Information).
        Returns:
        String containing the title, or null if there was none in the file.

      • getSide1FontName

        public String getSide1FontName()
        This operation returns the side 1 font name contained in the XML file.
        Returns:
        Font name contained in the XML file, or null if no font was included.

      • getSide2FontName

        public String getSide2FontName()
        This operation returns the side 2 font name contained in the XML file.
        Returns:
        Font name contained in the XML file, or null if no font was included.

      • getSide3FontName

        public String getSide3FontName()
        This operation returns the side 3 font name contained in the XML file.
        Returns:
        Font name contained in the XML file, or null if no font was included.

      • getSide1Size

        public int getSide1Size()
        This operation returns the side 1 font size contained in the XML file.
        Returns:
        Size of font contained in XML file, or -1 if no size is included.

      • getSide2Size

        public int getSide2Size()
        This operation returns the side 2 font size contained in the XML file.
        Returns:
        Size of font contained in XML file, or -1 if no size is included.

      • getSide3Size

        public int getSide3Size()
        This operation returns the side 3 font size contained in the XML file.
        Returns:
        Size of font contained in XML file, or -1 if no size is included.

      • getSide1Title

        public String getSide1Title()
        This operation returns the side 1 title contained in the XML file.
        Returns:
        Title contained in XML file, or null if no title is included.

      • getSide2Title

        public String getSide2Title()
        This operation returns the side 2 title contained in the XML file.
        Returns:
        Title contained in XML file, or null if no title is included.

      • getSide3Title

        public String getSide3Title()
        This operation returns the side 3 title contained in the XML file.
        Returns:
        Title contained in XML file, or null if no title is included.

      • getFlashCardSet

        public InternalFlashCard getFlashCardSet(boolean loadFullTest,
                                String theFileName)
        This operation returns a list of flash cards, built from data contained in the XML file.
        Parameters:
        loadFullTest - Indicates that full data from a saved test is to be loaded.
        theFileName - Name of the file containing the cards.
        Returns:
        Pointer to the first flash card in the list, or null if there was none included in the file.

      • processCard

        private InternalFlashCard processCard(Element theCardElement,
                            String cardFileName,
                            boolean loadFullTest)
        This method processes the XML for a flash card.
        Parameters:
        theCardElement - XML tree for a flash card.
        cardFileName - Name of file from which the card was retrieved.
        loadFullTest - True if loading a saved game; false otherwise.
        Returns:
        A filled out flash card, or null if an error occurs.

      • processSide

        private String processSide(Element cardElement,
                 String sideName,
                 String directoryName)
        This method processes a side element.
        Parameters:
        cardElement - Element containing the flash card.
        sideName - Name of the side element to be processed.
        directoryName - Name of the directory containing the file containing the card.
        Returns:
        String containing HTML for the side. If an error occurs, this will read "Uninitialized".

      • processSideTextOnly

        private String processSideTextOnly(Element cardElement,
                         String sideName,
                         String directoryName)
        This method returns the text content (without any HTML/XML tags) of a specified sideElement.
        Parameters:
        cardElement - Element containing the flash card.
        sideName - Name of the side element to be processed.
        directoryName - Name of the directory containing the file containing the card.
        Returns:
        String containing HTML for the side. If an error occurs, this will read "Uninitialized".

      • processBooleanElement

        private boolean processBooleanElement(Element cardElement,
                            String elementName)
        This method returns a boolean value from an element. If the element is not true or false, it returns false.
        Parameters:
        cardElement - Element containing the card information.
        elementName - Name of the element.
        Returns:
        True if the element is "true", false otherwise.

      • processStringElement

        private String processStringElement(Element cardElement,
                          String elementName)
        This method returns a string element, or null if an error is detected.
        Parameters:
        cardElement - Element containing the card information.
        elementName - Name of the element.
        Returns:
        String containing the value of the element, or null if an error is detected.
